perturbation.original_text: b) Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the first year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in nine equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on March 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments on or prior to the fifteenth day of each of the next eight (8) calendar months.
perturbation.changed_text: b) Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the first year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in nine equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on March 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments on or prior to the last day of each of the next eight (8) calendar months.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline for the monthly installments. Originally, payments were due on or prior to the fifteenth day of each month. Now, one section states they are due on or prior to the last day of each month, creating ambiguity as to when payments are considered late.

perturbation.original_text: c) Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee, NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the second year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on December 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments on or prior to the fifteenth day of each of the next eleven (11) calendar months.
perturbation.changed_text: c) Separate and apart from the one-time sponsorship initiation fee, NetGrocer shall pay to Excite sponsorship and advertising fees for the second year of the term of the Agreement in the total amount of [*] payable in equal monthly installments of [*], commencing on December 15, 1998. NetGrocer will pay the remainder of the monthly installments within ten (10) business days of receiving an invoice from Excite for each of the next eleven (11) calendar months.
perturbation.explanation: This modification creates a contradiction by changing the payment deadline. The original text specifies the 15th day of each month, while the altered text requires payment within ten business days of invoice receipt. This uncertainty can lead to disagreements regarding payment schedules and potential late fees.

perturbation.original_text: k) Excite will maintain accurate records with respect to calculation of all payments due under this Agreement. NetGrocer may, upon no less than thirty (30) days prior written notice to Excite cause an independent Certified Public Accountant to inspect the records of Excite reasonably -8- related to the calculation of such payments during Excite's normal business hours. The fees charged by such Certified Public Accountant will be paid by NetGrocer unless the audit finds a discrepancy of more than five percent (5%) with respect to the item being audited, in which case Excite shall be responsible for the payment of the reasonable fees for such inspection.
perturbation.changed_text: k) Excite will maintain accurate records with respect to calculation of all payments due under this Agreement. NetGrocer may, upon no less than fifteen (15) days prior written notice to Excite cause an independent Certified Public Accountant to inspect the records of Excite reasonably -8- related to the calculation of such payments during Excite's normal business hours. The fees charged by such Certified Public Accountant will always be paid by NetGrocer, regardless of any discrepancy found during the audit.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict concerning the conditions for auditing payment records. Initially, NetGrocer had to provide 30 days' notice, and Excite would cover audit fees if a discrepancy exceeding 5% was found. The modified text reduces the notice to 15 days and makes NetGrocer responsible for all audit fees irrespective of audit findings, creating uncertainty and potential disputes regarding audit procedures and costs.
